  You have got yourself some good/clear files!  Keep up the good work.  Later
   
  Rees

itcdeadpeople <ITCdeadpeople@...> wrote:
          Just a quick note to let y'all know I've replaced the files in my EVP Maker folder with four new 
ones from tonight. I'm very impressed with the responses/answers I am being given. 

I received a greeting, by name. 
Confirmation when I asked if I'd heard correctly.
An object on my desk was correctly identified.
An object in my left hand was correctly identified (with a unique interpretation of it!)

http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Margaret%20Downey/SJ%20Allophones/

I hope you can hear some of these. I've been working to gather examples which show 
relevance and intent of communication. Arthur is on a roll. LOL. ;0)



                           

       
---------------------------------
